queries.description: Single empty OVER() sum
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single empty OVER() sum with select columns
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(), int_col FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single empty OVER() max with select columns with alias
queries.sql: SELECT string_col AS str, MAX(double_col) OVER() AS max, int_col FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single empty OVER() min with select columns and default frame
queries.sql: SELECT bool_col, MIN(int_col) OVER(ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), double_col FROM {tbl}
queries.comments: Calcite validation fails if RANGE is used but later Calcite overrides ROWS with RANGE

queries.description: Single empty OVER() avg with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, AVG(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col

queries.description: Single empty OVER() count with select col with global order by with LIMIT
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col LIMIT 5
queries.comments: Cannot use LIMIT without ORDER BY since the results can change and we cannot verify exact row outputs

queries.description: Single empty OVER() and transform col
queries.sql: SELECT CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-'), AVG(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col = 'a' AND bool_col = false

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('b', 'c')

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select transform and filter
queries.sql: SELECT CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-'), MAX(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} where int_col < 50 OR double_col = 1.01

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with group by
queries.sql: SELECT MAX({tbl}.int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, MIN({tbl}.int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, int_col

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select col, agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Single empty OVER() with select col, agg col and group by with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col ORDER BY int_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col) OVER(), COUNT(string_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select columns
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(), int_col, MAX(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select columns with alias
queries.sql: SELECT string_col AS str, MAX(double_col) OVER() AS max, int_col, SUM(int_col) OVER() AS sum FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER() with select columns and default frame on one but not the other
queries.sql: SELECT bool_col, MIN(int_col) OVER(ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), double_col, AVG(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}
queries.comments: Calcite validation fails if RANGE is used but later Calcite overrides ROWS with RANGE

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(), COUNT(string_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col with global order by with LIMIT
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER(), AVG(int_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col LIMIT 5
queries.comments: Cannot use LIMIT without ORDER BY since the results can change and we cannot verify exact row outputs

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s and transform col
queries.sql: SELECT UPPER(CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-')), AVG(int_col) OVER(), MIN(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER(), MIN(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col = 'a' AND bool_col != false

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(), AVG(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col NOT IN ('a', 'd', 'e', 'g', 'h')

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER() with select transform and filter
queries.sql: SELECT LENGTH(CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-')), MAX(int_col) OVER(), COUNT(double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} where int_col < 50 OR double_col = 1.01

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with group by
queries.sql: SELECT MAX({tbl}.double_col) OVER(), COUNT({tbl}.double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY double_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, MIN({tbl}.double_col) OVER(), SUM({tbl}.double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, double_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(double_col), SUM({tbl}.double_col) OVER(), AVG({tbl}.double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY double_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col, agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(double_col), SUM({tbl}.double_col) OVER(), AVG({tbl}.double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY double_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER() with select col, agg col and group by with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(double_col), SUM({tbl}.double_col) OVER(), AVG({tbl}.double_col) OVER() FROM {tbl} GROUP BY double_col ORDER BY double_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) sum
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) sum with select columns
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), int_col FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) max with select columns with alias
queries.sql: SELECT string_col AS str, MAX(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) AS max, int_col FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) min with select columns and default frame
queries.sql: SELECT bool_col, MIN(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), double_col FROM {tbl}
queries.comments: Calcite validation fails if RANGE is used but later Calcite overrides ROWS with RANGE

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) avg with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY (2 keys)) avg with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, bool_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col, bool_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col, bool_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) count with select col with global order by with LIMIT
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col LIMIT 6
queries.comments: Cannot use LIMIT without ORDER BY since the results can change and we cannot verify exact row outputs

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) and transform col
queries.sql: SELECT CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-'), AVG(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col = 'a' AND bool_col = false

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col, string_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('b', 'c')

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select transform and filter
queries.sql: SELECT CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-'), MAX(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col, int_col) FROM {tbl} where int_col < 50 OR double_col = 1

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with group by
queries.sql: SELECT MAX({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, int_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, MIN({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, int_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select col, agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY) with select col, agg col and group by with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col ORDER BY int_col

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), COUNT(string_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select columns
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), int_col, MAX(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select columns with alias
queries.sql: SELECT string_col AS str, MAX(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) AS max, int_col, MIN(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) AS sum FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select columns and default frame on one but not the other
queries.sql: SELECT bool_col, MIN(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING), double_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col) FROM {tbl}
queries.comments: Calcite validation fails if RANGE is used but later Calcite overrides ROWS with RANGE

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), COUNT(string_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col

queries.description: Single OVER(PARTITION BY (2 keys))s avg with select col with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, bool_col, AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col, bool_col), COUNT(string_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col, string_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col, bool_col

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select col with global order by with LIMIT
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), AVG(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} ORDER BY string_col LIMIT 6
queries.comments: Cannot use LIMIT without ORDER BY since the results can change and we cannot verify exact row outputs

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s and transform col
queries.sql: SELECT UPPER(CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-')), AVG(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), MIN(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, COUNT(bool_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col), MIN(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col = 'a' AND bool_col != false

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select col and filter
queries.sql: SELECT double_col, SUM(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col, string_col), AVG(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY bool_col, string_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col NOT IN ('a', 'd', 'e', 'g', 'h')

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select transform and filter
queries.sql: SELECT LENGTH(CONCAT(string_col, bool_col, '-')), MAX(int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col, int_col), COUNT(double_col) OVER(PARTITION BY string_col, int_col) FROM {tbl} where int_col < 50 OR double_col = 1

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with group by
queries.sql: SELECT MAX({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col), COUNT({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, int_col

queries.description: Multiple OVER(PARTITION BY)s with select col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT string_col, MIN({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.string_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, int_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col), AVG({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER()s with select col, agg col and group by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col), AVG({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col

queries.description: Multiple empty OVER() with select col, agg col and group by with global order by
queries.sql: SELECT int_col, SUM(int_col), SUM({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col), AVG({tbl}.int_col) OVER(PARTITION BY {tbl}.int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY int_col ORDER BY int_col
